author: ts:ez.no
msg: - Refactored ImageAnalysis to be able use multiple handlers (to be capable of analyzing more formats):
- Added ezcImageAnalyzerHandler (abstract base class for all handlers).
- Added ezcImageAnalyzerPhpHandler (implementation of the original ImageAnalysis functionality in this handler).
- Added ezcImageAnalyzerImagemagickHandler (still to implement, will use ImageMagick's "identify" binary to analyze a file).
- Implemented loading and choosing of a feasible handler in ezcImageAnalysis.
- Added static getHandlerClasses() and setHandlerClasses() methods on the ezcImageAnalyzer to manipulate the handler classes.
- Implemented ezcImageAnalyzerData struct to store the data gathered by an ezcImageAnalyzerHandler class (attention: Interface change!!).
# Instead of $analyzer->size you now do $analyzer->data->size. Rest stays as it is.
- Migrated ezcImageConversion to use the new interface.
- Fixed test cases of ImageAnalysis package to use the new interface.

author: ts:ez.no
msg: - Migrated from exec() to proc_open() in ezcImageImagemagickHandler, for better error processing facilities and to remove enoying console output, if ImageMagick throws an error.

author: dr:ez.no
msg: - Update exceptions doc with outcome of meeting.

author: ts:ez.no
msg: - Refined implementaion of ezcImageGeometryFilter::scale(). This method is now implemented as intended originally and allows scaling of an image to fit in a certain box (e.g. 640x480). The scaleExact() filter (which was by now an alias to scale()) still offers the functionality which was offered by scale until now (stretching/scaling to an exact size).
- Adjusted test cases to the new behavior.
- Fixed test cases relying on this filter.
